posts.post_content:
All appear vg-ex, though I may have missed a minor crease or pencil mark etc. 

I can guarantee, these are authentic and look terrific. I have come across a couple in this pile, that were absolutely scissored, as well as written upon eons ago -though doubtful maliciously. 

Therefore, I can't guarantee they havent been trimmed, altered, bleached, recolored etc etc, sorry. 

Ive got big mutha images, but you may have to wait for a reply. 

Entire lot only... Make an email offer. Tanx, Steve 

[url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

If the person that purchased this lot has any intention of breaking it up or would be interested in selling a card or two please contact me.

Thank you.

[url]abravefan@msn.com[/url]
